content.title: Peacemakers
content.description: Is peace impossible? That depends on you.

image1.alt: Girl wearing a head covering holding a hand drawn picture of her violent environment.

content.text1: Peacemakers is our opportunity to work towards peace and justice in some of the most vulnerable communities around the world. Take a step to become a peacemaker below.

button1.description: Introduction to our Peacemakers campaign and watch video button.

content.text1: Together, we made peace possible by raising $160,858 for peacebuilding projects through our partner, Mennonite Central Committee.

The first step to peacebuilding is to learn about a conflict. By having a posture of learning before we act, we can be more effective agents for peace. Take time to learn about our partnership with MCC and the areas we are investing in peacebuilding.
After learning about a conflict we can take steps to work toward peace. In many situations this includes working to right injustices so that individuals and communities can heal. You can help by:
